segments.text: I called about that ad we saw in the paper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You were right , it was from a headhunter . He wouldn't tell me anything without a signed contract .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No ! Not at all . But I did find out they have more than one position with different clients , so at least one would probably work out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great , so are you going to sign a contract with them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And I think I'll look in on a few other Employment Agencies while I ’ m downtown , to see what they have .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea . The more people you ask , the better your chances are .
segments.speaker: S2
